verses.verse: In the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the son<WH1121> of Ahasuerus<WH325>, of the seed<WH2233> of the Medes<WH4074>, which was made king<WH4427> over the realm<WH4438> of the Chaldeans<WH3778>; which: or, in which he

In the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of his reign<WH4427> I Daniel<WH1840> understood<WH995> by books<WH5612> the number<WH4557> of the years<WH8141>, whereof the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came to Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030>, that he would accomplish<WH4390> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141> in the desolations<WH2723> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.
And I set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> unto the Lord<WH136> God<WH430>, to seek<WH1245> by prayer<WH8605> and supplications<WH8469>, with fasting<WH6685>, and sackcloth<WH8242>, and ashes<WH665>:

And I prayed<WH6419> unto the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430>, and made my confession<WH3034>, and said<WH559>, O<WH577> Lord<WH136>, the great<WH1419> and dreadful<WH3372> God<WH410>, keeping<WH8104> the covenant<WH1285> and mercy<WH2617> to them that love<WH157> him, and to them that keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687>;

We have sinned<WH2398>, and have committed iniquity<WH5753>, and have done wickedly<WH7561>, and have rebelled<WH4775>, even by departing<WH5493> from thy precepts<WH4687> and from thy judgments<WH4941>:

Neither have we hearkened<WH8085> unto thy servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, which spake<WH1696> in thy name<WH8034> to our kings<WH4428>, our princes<WH8269>, and our fathers<WH1>, and to all the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776>.

O Lord<WH136>, righteousness<WH6666> belongeth unto thee, but unto us confusion<WH1322> of faces<WH6440>, as at this day<WH3117>; to the men<WH376> of Judah<WH3063>, and to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and unto all Israel<WH3478>, that are near<WH7138>, and that are far off<WH7350>, through all the countries<WH776> whither thou hast driven<WH5080> them, because of their trespass<WH4604> that they have trespassed<WH4603> against thee. belongeth: or, thou hast
O Lord<WH136>, to us belongeth confusion<WH1322> of face<WH6440>, to our kings<WH4428>, to our princes<WH8269>, and to our fathers<WH1>, because we have sinned<WH2398> against thee.
To the Lord<WH136> our God<WH430> belong mercies<WH7356> and forgivenesses<WH5547>, though we have rebelled<WH4775> against him;

Neither have we obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430>, to walk<WH3212> in his laws<WH8451>, which he set<WH5414> before<WH6440> us by<WH3027> his servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>.

Yea, all Israel<WH3478> have transgressed<WH5674> thy law<WH8451>, even by departing<WH5493>, that they might not obey<WH8085> thy voice<WH6963>; therefore the curse<WH423> is poured<WH5413> upon us, and the oath<WH7621> that is written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of God<WH430>, because we have sinned<WH2398> against him.

And he hath confirmed<WH6965> his words<WH1697>, which he spake<WH1696> against us, and against our judges<WH8199> that judged<WH8199> us, by bringing<WH935> upon us a great<WH1419> evil<WH7451>: for under the whole heaven<WH8064> hath not been done<WH6213> as hath been done<WH6213> upon Jerusalem<WH3389>.

As it is written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872>, all this evil<WH7451> is come<WH935> upon us: yet made we not our prayer<WH2470> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430>, that we might turn<WH7725> from our iniquities<WH5771>, and understand<WH7919> thy truth<WH571>. made: Heb. intreated we not the face of the, etc

Therefore hath the LORD<WH3068> watched<WH8245> upon the evil<WH7451>, and brought<WH935> it upon us: for the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> is righteous<WH6662> in all his works<WH4639> which he doeth<WH6213>: for we obeyed<WH8085> not his voice<WH6963>.

And now, O Lord<WH136> our God<WH430>, that hast brought<WH3318> thy people<WH5971> forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and hast gotten<WH6213> thee renown<WH8034>, as at this day<WH3117>; we have sinned<WH2398>, we have done wickedly<WH7561>. gotten: Heb. made thee a name

O Lord<WH136>, according to all thy righteousness<WH6666>, I beseech thee, let thine anger<WH639> and thy fury<WH2534> be turned away<WH7725> from thy city<WH5892> Jerusalem<WH3389>, thy holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>: because for our sins<WH2399>, and for the iniquities<WH5771> of our fathers<WH1>, Jerusalem<WH3389> and thy people<WH5971> are become a reproach<WH2781> to all that are about<WH5439> us.

Now therefore, O our God<WH430>, hear<WH8085> the prayer<WH8605> of thy servant<WH5650>, and his supplications<WH8469>, and cause thy face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> upon thy sanctuary<WH4720> that is desolate<WH8076>, for the Lord's<WH136> sake.

O my God<WH430>, incline<WH5186> thine ear<WH241>, and hear<WH8085>; open<WH6491> thine eyes<WH5869>, and behold<WH7200> our desolations<WH8074>, and the city<WH5892> which is called<WH7121> by thy name<WH8034>: for we do not present<WH5307> our supplications<WH8469> before<WH6440> thee for our righteousnesses<WH6666>, but for thy great<WH7227> mercies<WH7356>. which: Heb. whereupon thy name is called present: Heb. cause to fall

O Lord<WH136>, hear<WH8085>; O Lord<WH136>, forgive<WH5545>; O Lord<WH136>, hearken<WH7181> and do<WH6213>; defer<WH309> not<WH408>, for thine own sake, O my God<WH430>: for thy city<WH5892> and thy people<WH5971> are called<WH7121> by thy name<WH8034>.

And whiles I was speaking<WH1696>, and praying<WH6419>, and confessing<WH3034> my sin<WH2403> and the sin<WH2403> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>, and presenting<WH5307> my supplication<WH8467> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430> for the holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022> of my God<WH430>;

Yea, whiles I was speaking<WH1696> in prayer<WH8605>, even the man<WH376> Gabriel<WH1403>, whom I had seen<WH7200> in the vision<WH2377> at the beginning<WH8462>, being caused to fly<WH3286> swiftly<WH3288>, touched<WH5060> me about the time<WH6256> of the evening<WH6153> oblation<WH4503>. swiftly: Heb. with weariness, or, flight

And he informed<WH995> me, and talked<WH1696> with me, and said<WH559>, O Daniel<WH1840>, I am now come forth<WH3318> to give thee skill<WH7919> and understanding<WH998>. to: Heb. to make thee skilful of

At the beginning<WH8462> of thy supplications<WH8469> the commandment<WH1697> came forth<WH3318>, and I am come<WH935> to shew<WH5046> thee; for thou art greatly beloved<WH2532>: therefore understand<WH995> the matter<WH1697>, and consider<WH995> the vision<WH4758>. commandment: Heb. word greatly: Heb. a man of desires

Seventy<WH7657> weeks<WH7620> are determined<WH2852> upon thy people<WH5971> and upon thy holy<WH6944> city<WH5892>, to finish<WH3607> the transgression<WH6588>, and to make an end<WH8552> <WH2856> of sins<WH2403>, and to make reconciliation<WH3722> for iniquity<WH5771>, and to bring in<WH935> everlasting<WH5769> righteousness<WH6664>, and to seal up<WH2856> the vision<WH2377> and prophecy<WH5030>, and to anoint<WH4886> the most<WH6944> Holy<WH6944>. finish: or, restrain make an: or, seal up prophecy: Heb. prophet

Know<WH3045> therefore and understand<WH7919>, that from the going forth<WH4161> of the commandment<WH1697> to restore<WH7725> and to build<WH1129> Jerusalem<WH3389> unto the Messiah<WH4899> the Prince<WH5057> shall be seven<WH7651> weeks<WH7620>, and threescore<WH8346> and two<WH8147> weeks<WH7620>: the street<WH7339> shall be built<WH1129> again<WH7725>, and the wall<WH2742>, even in troublous<WH6695> times<WH6256>. be built: Heb. return and be built wall: or, breach, or, ditch troublous: Heb. strait of

And after<WH310> threescore<WH8346> and two<WH8147> weeks<WH7620> shall Messiah<WH4899> be cut off<WH3772>, but not for himself: and the people<WH5971> of the prince<WH5057> that shall come<WH935> shall destroy<WH7843> the city<WH5892> and the sanctuary<WH6944>; and the end<WH7093> thereof shall be with a flood<WH7858>, and unto the end<WH7093> of the war<WH4421> desolations<WH8074> are determined<WH2782>. but: or, and shall have nothing desolations: or, it shall be cut off by desolations

And he shall confirm<WH1396> the covenant<WH1285> with many<WH7227> for one<WH259> week<WH7620>: and in the midst<WH2677> of the week<WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice<WH2077> and the oblation<WH4503> to cease<WH7673>, and for the overspreading<WH3671> of abominations<WH8251> he shall make it desolate<WH8074>, even until the consummation<WH3617>, and that determined<WH2782> shall be poured<WH5413> upon the desolate<WH8074>. the covenant: or, a covenant for the: or, with the abominable armies the desolate: or, the desolator
